result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Robbery of a Financial Institution, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.87.
  • Armed Robbery, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).
  • Armed Robbery, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
As to Count 1:   
Court ordered the defendant to pay restitution in the amount of $940.00 to Tri-City Bank at 3378 S 27th St., Milwaukee, WI.
To be paid from prison funds not to exceed 25%.
Unpaid balance to be paid while on Extended Supervision.   
As to Count 2:   
Court ordered the  defendant to pay restitution in the amount of $1,982.00 to TFC Bank at 1818 W. National Ave., Milwaukee, WI.
To be paid from prison funds not to exceed 25%.
Unpaid balance to be paid while on Extended Supervision.

Court ordered the defendant to pay the DNA surcharge in all 3 Counts PLUS pay the costs and disbursements for all 3 Counts.  
Monies are ordered taken from 25% of prison funds not to exceed 25%.  Unpaid balance to be paid while on Extended Supervision.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obtain and maintain employment.
Be given job and vocational training.
Defendant advised that as a convicted felon no possession of any firearms/ body armor.

NO controlled substances other than those legally prescribed for the defendant by a duly licensed physician for defendant's mental or physical needs; take only as long as deemed medically reasonable and necessary.  
NO alcohol.  
NO CONTACT with Gilberto V., Andrea S., or Rosemary P.  
NO CONTACT with TriCity Bank at 3378 S. 27th St., Milwaukee, WI.
NO CONTACT with TCF Banj=k at 1818 W. National Ave., Milwaukee, WI.  
NO CONTACT with  TriCity Bank at 110 W. Holt Ave., Milwaukee, WI.

Urine screens.  
Undergo a Mental Health evaluation; follow through with any treatment recommended.   
Parenting classes/ counseling.  
Cognitive Thinking Intervention counseling.

/for Presentence Investigation, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in custody.  Deann L. Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case was passed to the afternoon calendar at the request of defense counsel.  Plea hearing proceeds.  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, and further advised that if not a United States citizen deportation is possible. Defendant sworn, examined as to plea, and entered a plea of guilty.  Court found defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived all constitutional rights. Plea questionnaire waiver of rights and addendum to plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulated to the criminal complaint as factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered into the record.  The Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon not to possess any firearms/body armor.    Court further advised defendant of voting ineligibility.   Bail ________.

Attorney Stephen A Sargent in court, defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles not in court, in custody.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties' joint request for adjournment was granted by the Court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 22, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Stephen A Sargent in court, defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles not in court, in custody.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case is adjourned for plea and sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 2, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Stephen A Sargent in court, defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles not in court, in custody.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel  requested a plea date.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 14, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in custody.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 20.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with any/all TCF and TRI-CITY BANKS.

Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Defendant Demetrius Damon Pyles in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings. 
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
